wikipedia_page.main: Gerry Humphreys OBE (11 May 1931 – 5 December 2006) was a Welsh sound engineer. He was nominated for two Academy Awards in the category Best Sound. He worked on 250 films between 1952 and 2002. He was appointed OBE in the 1995 New Year Honours.
